targets.query:
from(bucket: "gazpar")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gazpar_informative_measure")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "energy_kWh")
  |> drop(columns:["year","month","pce","pce_alias","_measurement","_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

import "date"
from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: -7d, stop: -6d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Mesuré")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    if "$measure_unit" == "kWh" then r["_field"] == "Energie consommée (kWh)"
    else if  "$measure_unit" == "€" then r["_field"] == "cout"  
    else r["_field"] == "Volume consommé (m3)"
    )
  |> keep(columns:["_time","_value","_field","weekday_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "actual")

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: -6d, stop: -5d)

    else if  "$measure_unit" == "€" then r["_field"] == "cout"

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: -4y, stop: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["year"] == string(v: date.year(t: -3y)))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Mesuré")
    |> filter(fn: (r) =>

    else if  "$measure_unit" == "€" then r["_field"] == "cout"

    )

  |> drop(columns:["weekday_name","weekday_no","month_name","pce","pce_alias","month","month_short","_measurement","type","mois_num"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1y, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.description: Tendance par rapport au mois passé sur la même période

targets.query:
import "date"

// Get last measure date of the current month
yesterday = date.truncate(t: -1d, unit: 1d)
yesterday_m1 = date.truncate(t: -1mo, unit: 1d)

// Get data
data = from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: -2mo, stop: -0mo)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Mesuré")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    if "$measure_unit" == "kWh" then r["_field"] == "Energie consommée (kWh)"
    else if  "$measure_unit" == "€" then r["_field"] == "cout"  
    else r["_field"] == "Volume consommé (m3)"
    )
  |> drop(columns:["year","weekday_name","month_name","month_short", "weekday_no","pce","pce_alias","_measurement","type"])
  |> group()

// Set dataset based on current month
m0 = data
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["mois_num"] == string(v: date.month(t: yesterday)))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with m0: r._value }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with key: "A" }))
  |> keep(columns:["m0","key"])
  //|> yield(name: "current")

// Set dataset based on previous month
m1 = data
  |> range(start: -2mo, stop: yesterday_m1)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["mois_num"] == string(v: date.month(t: yesterday_m1)))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with m1: r._value }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with key: "A" }))
  |> keep(columns:["m1","key"])
  //|> yield(name: "previous")

// Join datasets and calculate percentage
join(
  tables: {m1: m1, m0: m0},
  on: ["key"],
  method: "inner"
)
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
  trend:  
  if not exists r["m1"] or r["m1"] == 0.0 then 0.0
  else ((r["m0"]-r["m1"]) / r["m1"] )*100.0
  }))
|> keep(columns:["trend"])
|> yield(name: "trend")

panels.title: Tendance

targets.query:
from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Mesuré")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "prix_fixe")
  |> keep(columns:["_time","_value","_field"])
  |> group(columns: ["prix_fixe"], mode: "by")
  |> last()

data = from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: -1mo, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Mesuré")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    if "$measure_unit" == "kWh" then r["_field"] == "Energie consommée (kWh)"
    else if  "$measure_unit" == "€" then r["_field"] == "cout"  
    else r["_field"] == "Volume consommé (m3)"
    )
  |> keep(columns:["_time","_value","_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> timeShift(duration: -1d, columns: ["_time"])
  |> yield(name: "data")
  

minData = data
|> min()
|> yield(name: "min")


maxData = data
|> max()
|> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Mesuré")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Température locale (°C)")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.description: Tendance par rapport à l'année dernière sur la même période

targets.query:
import "date"

// Get last measure date of the current month
yesterday = date.truncate(t: -1d, unit: 1d)
yesterday_m1 = date.truncate(t: -1y, unit: 1d)
yesterday_m2 = date.truncate(t: -2y, unit: 1d)

// Get data
data = from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: -3y, stop: -0mo)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Mesuré")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Volume consommé (m3)")
  |> drop(columns:["month","weekday_name","month_name","weekday_no","pce_alias", "pce","month_short","_measurement","type","mois_num","_start","_stop"])
  |> group()
  //|> yield(name: "alpha")

// Set dataset based on current year AN
m0 = data
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["year"] == string(v: date.year(t: yesterday)))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1y, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with m0: r._value }))
  //|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with key: string(v: date.year(t: yesterday)) }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with key: "A" }))
  |> keep(columns:["m0","key"])
  //|> yield(name: string(v: date.year(t: yesterday)))

// Set dataset based on previous year AN-1 
m1 = data
  |> range(start: -2y, stop: yesterday_m1)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["year"] == string(v: date.year(t: yesterday_m1)))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1y, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with m1: r._value }))
  //|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with key: string(v: date.year(t: yesterday_m1))}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with key: "A" }))
  |> keep(columns:["m1","key"])
  //|> yield(name: string(v: date.year(t: yesterday_m1)))

// Set dataset based AN-2

m2 = data
  |> range(start: -3y, stop: yesterday_m2)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["year"] == string(v: date.year(t: yesterday_m2)))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1y, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with m2: r._value }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with key: "A" }))
  //|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with key: string(v: date.year(t: yesterday_m2))}))
  |> keep(columns:["m2","key"])
  //|> yield(name: string(v: date.year(t: yesterday_m2)))


  // Join datasets and calculate percentage
join(
  tables: {m2: m2, m1: m1},
  on: ["key"],
  method: "inner"
)
|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
  trend:  
  if not exists r["m2"] or r["m2"] == 0.0 then 0.0
  else ((r["m1"]-r["m2"]) / r["m2"] )*100.0
  }))
|> keep(columns:["trend"])
|> yield(name: "trend")

from(bucket: "$bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: 1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Mesuré")
  |> keep(columns:["pce"])
  |> group()
